response:
"wie kann man noch heute davon sprechen, dass die privatsphäre beschützt wird, wenn wir unsere persönlichen daten auf sozialen medien und im internet preisgeben? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "how can we still talk about protecting privacy when we share our personal data on social media and the internet? #dataprotection #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the idea of protecting personal information in the context of online data collection and sharing. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection) and #privatsphäre (privacy) are used to reach a wider audience interested in these topics. by using the phrase "wie kann man noch heute davon sprechen" (how can we still talk about it today), the post implies that the concept of privacy is becoming increasingly outdated in the digital age.
